Description: You focus all of your willpower into your head and ram it into a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 17 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
